code: import React,{useState}from'react';import"./attitude.css";import At1 from'./Chapters/at1';import At2 from'./Chapters/at2';import At3 from'./Chapters/at3';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Attitude=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([{id:1,title:'Chapter 1',content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(At1,{})},{id:2,title:'Chapter 2',content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(At2,{})},{id:3,title:'Chapter 3',content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(At3,{})}]);const toggleItem=id=>{setItems(prevItems=>prevItems.map(item=>item.id===id?{...item,isOpen:!item.isOpen}:item));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bookinfo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"maintitle",children:"Attitude is everything"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"listclass",children:items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chapter",children:[item.isOpen?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-caret-down"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-caret-right"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"togglelist",onClick:()=>toggleItem(item.id),children:item.title})]}),item.isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.content})]},item.id))})]});};export default Attitude;
